src:
蕾絲蛋捲 簡單不需模具（視頻）

07 Nov 2019, 11:30

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】輕鬆做出蕾絲蛋捲
材料表:雞蛋3顆低筋麵粉80g全脂奶粉15g細砂糖40g無鹽奶油40g(需先隔水加熱液態化)
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/07/a102701691.html
text:
Lace Egg Roll Simple without mold (video)

07 Nov 2019, 11:30

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 07, 2019] Easy to make a lace egg roll
Material list: eggs 3 low-gluten flour 80g whole milk powder 15g fine sugar 40g salt-free cream 40g (need to be heated by liquid water)
The following YouTube video demo:
